name: Trek
description: American bicycle and cycling product manufacturer.

name: Specialized
description: Specialized Bicycle Components is an American company designing and manufacturing bicycles and related products.

name: Giant
description: Giant Manufacturing is a Taiwanese bicycle manufacturer and one of the world's largest.

name: Cannondale
description: Cannondale is an American brand of premium bicycles known for innovation in materials and design.

name: Scott
description: Scott Sports is a Swiss company producing bicycles, winter equipment and motorsports gear.

name: Cervélo
description: Cervélo is a Canadian manufacturer focused on high-performance road and triathlon bikes.

name: Bianchi
description: Bianchi is an iconic Italian bicycle manufacturer known for its Celeste color and racing heritage.

name: Canyon
description: Canyon Bicycles is a German direct-to-consumer bicycle company known for performance road and gravel bikes.
